name: Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds Complete Collection
name_original: Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds Complete Collection
description:
Download and play Hot Shots Golf®: Out of Bounds with the complete DLC collection bundled together for the first time.

Slip on the golf shoes, step out on the course and tee it up on the PlayStation®3 system with Hot Shots Golf®: Out Of Bounds. Rip a 300 yard drive down the middle of the fairway or go pin hunting on those tricky par 3s. No mulligans needed as Hot Shots Golf®: Out of Bounds is all about having fun and enjoying the most entertaining and over the top golfing experience imaginable. So come on, step up and give it your best shot.

- Tee off in the mountains, in the desert & along the coast
- New shot system offers unprecedented control
- Online tournament up to 50 players
- All the crazy characters & caddies imaginable (including Kratos and Sackboy)

On October 31, 2013 Sony Computer Entertainment America will terminate the online service for the PlayStation®3 title Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds™. Multi-player and all online features for this product will be terminated and will no longer be available on October 31, 2013.
